trans-unit.source: Annotates a property on a class that has been annotated with the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.MediaEntryAttribute"></xref>.
The `MimeTypePropertyAttribute` takes the name of the property that holds the mime type to associate with the property specified in the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.MediaEntryAttribute>.

The property specified is automatically set to the mime type of data when a media resource associated with the media link entry is delay-loaded by the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.LoadProperty%2A> method.
The system also reads the mime type from this property and uses it to set the `Content-Type` header in a POST request for a media link entry.
A media link entry is an AtomPub protocol construct for handling binary data and metadata.
Creates a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MimeTypePropertyAttribute" name="MimeTypePropertyAttribute" href=""></xref>.
A string that contains the name of the new property attribute.
A string that contains the Mime type of the new property attribute.
Gets the name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MimeTypePropertyAttribute" name="MimeTypePropertyAttribute" href=""></xref>.
A string that contains the name of the property attribute.
Gets the Mime type of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MimeTypePropertyAttribute" name="MimeTypePropertyAttribute" href=""></xref>
A string that contains the Mime type of the property attribute.
